#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
# define mod 1000000007
# define long long ll
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n,x,y,i;
	string s;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		x=0;
		y=0;
		cin>>s;
		for(i=0;i<s.length();i++)
		{
			if(s[i]=='N')
			x++;
			if(s[i]=='S')
			x--;
			if(s[i]=='E')
			y++;
			if(s[i]=='W')
			y--;
		}
			//cout<<x<<" "<<y<<endl;
			if(x>0&&y>0)
			cout<<"NORTHEAST"<<endl;
			if(x>0&&y<0)
			cout<<"NORTHWEST"<<endl;
			if(x<0&&y>0)
			cout<<"SOUTHEAST"<<endl;
			if(x<0&&y<0)
			cout<<"SOUTHWEST"<<endl;
			if(x>0&&y==0)
			cout<<"NORTH"<<endl;
			if(x<0&&y==0)
			cout<<"SOUTH"<<endl;
			if(x==0&&y<0)
			cout<<"WEST"<<endl;
			if(x==0&&y>0)
			cout<<"EAST"<<endl;						
			
	}
	return 0;
}
